headline: A Look At Leidos Holdings (LDOS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Leidos Holdings stock in focus Leidos Holdings (LDOS) is drawing attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing mixed short term returns and a solid longer term track record, prompting investors to reassess its current valuation and business profile. See our latest analysis for Leidos Holdings. At a share price of $188.28, Leidos Holdings has seen a 4.37% 1 month share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 33.92% and 3 year total shareholder return of 99.11%...
